instruction: Describe the economy of the United States in five sentences.
output: The United States has a large and diverse economy. It is the largest economy in the world, with a GDP of over 21 trillion dollars. The US is heavily dependent on the service industry and consumer spending. The nation is home to some of the world's largest corporations and financial institutions, as well as a wide range of small and medium businesses. The economic system is driven by the free market and is supported by strong consumer demand and investment. Innovation and technological advancements have also driven the growth of the US economy.
